metadata.title: CVE-2024-0741 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds write in ANGLE could have allowed an attacker to corruptmemory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
